comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: That's "Ad" Wolgast, "Ad" short for Adolph. He became lightweight boxing champion of the world in 1910: www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,861392,00.html See more Wolgast pics here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2449486430/ www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2536796784/

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Adolphus Wolgast (February 8, 1888 in Cadillac, Michigan – April 14, 1955 in Camarillo, California) was a world lightweight boxing champion. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ad_Wolgast
